definition: April Fools' Day
to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Today is April 1. it April fool's day.
sentences.chinese: 今天是四月一号是愚人节。

sentences.english: You may laugh at a prank on April Fools' Day.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会因为愚人节的一个恶作剧而发笑。

sentences.english: A:Do you know about All Fools' Day?
sentences.chinese: 你知道愚人节是怎么回事台球？

sentences.english: Every April Fool 's Day, Xiaoqiang would think of ways to trick others.
sentences.chinese: 小强每年愚人节都想着法子捉弄别人。

sentences.english: Will be that April Fool's Day , I want several well tomorrow , will persecute others conveniently method.
sentences.chinese: 明天就是愚人节，我要几个好的，方便的整人方法。

sentences.english: Google has a tradition of perpetrating April Fools' Day hoaxes.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌有个在愚人节捉弄人的传统。

sentences.english: I was hoaxed on the April Fools' Day.
sentences.chinese: 愚人节我被人涮了一把。

sentences.english: April Fool’s Day is one of the best days of the year.
sentences.chinese: 愚人节是一年中最好的日子之一。

sentences.english: Japan started early with the April 1st specialties, but the jokes continue.
sentences.chinese: 日本会首先出现愚人节特别网页，但是玩笑还在继续。

sentences.english: I wanted to tell him that today is April Fool's Day, but I could not spit one word.
sentences.chinese: 我想说今天是愚人节，却一个字也没说出来。

sentences.english: Actually I wanted to tell him that today was April Fool's Day, but I could not say it out.
sentences.chinese: 我想说今天是愚人节，却一个字也没说出来。

sentences.english: April Fool's Day is a "for-fun-only" observance.
sentences.chinese: 愚人节是一个“仅为娱乐”的节日。

sentences.english: And of course, April Fool's Day was April's favorite day of the year.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，愚人节是艾普尔一年中最得意的一天。

sentences.english: Head to a website devoted to April Fool's Day.
sentences.chinese: 去一些愚人节专题网站逛逛。

sentences.english: So what kind of pranks do people paly on April Fool's Day?
sentences.chinese: 那么在愚人节这天人们会搞什么样的恶作剧呢？

sentences.english: I guess they play a trick on the new employee every April first.
sentences.chinese: 我想每年的愚人节，同事都会戏弄一下新进员工吧。

definition: Singles' Day (November 11), originally a day of activities for single people, but now also the world's biggest annual retail sales day
Valentine's Day

Silent Night (Christmas carol)/Christmas Eve
International Women's Day (March 8)
Children's Day (June 1st), PRC national holiday for children under 14
All Saints (Christian festival)
Christmas time/Christmas season/Christmas
to announce publicly/to explain oneself/to reveal one's feelings/to confess/to declare one's love
Youth Day (May 4th), PRC national holiday for young people aged 14 to 28, who get half a day off
birthday/CL:個|个[ge4]
Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
The Moment of Truth (TV show)/Truth or Dare (game)

definition: to joke/joke/jest
